privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Wellora
privacy.description: Learn how we respect and protect your data on Wellora.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Wellora! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using our website, you agree to our policy. If you disagree, please refrain from using our platform.

section1.title: 1. No Personal Data Collected
section1.content: Wellora is committed to protecting your privacy. We do not collect, store, or share any personally identifiable information. Our platform operates entirely without the need for your personal data, allowing you to use it anonymously and securely.

section2.title: 2. Cookies
section2.content: We use cookies to enhance your user experience on Wellora. Cookies are small files stored on your device to improve navigation, remember preferences, and provide minimal site analytics. These cookies do not store personal information and are used solely for improving site functionality.

section3.title: 3. Third-Party Links
section3.content: You may encounter links to external websites from Wellora. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or security of these third-party sites. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies before engaging with them.

section4.title: 4. Updates to Policy
section4.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. Any changes will be posted immediately on this page. By continuing to use our platform, you agree to any modifications made to this policy, so we encourage you to review it regularly for updates.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, or if you need more information about how your data is handled, please feel free to reach out to us via our contact details provided on the website.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about Wellora content and offerings.

faqs.question: What is Wellora?
faqs.answer: Wellora is a personal website that provides a diverse range of content, including study materials, tutorials, personal development books, and resources related to health, wealth, lifestyle, and relationships.

faqs.question: Is the content available in Tamil and Hindi?
faqs.answer: Yes, Wellora content is available in English, Tamil, and Hindi to cater to a broader audience and make learning more inclusive.

faqs.question: Can I download Wellora Content?
faqs.answer: Yes! Many PDFs, notes, and other learning resources from Wellora are available for download. Look for the download icons or links on each page to access them.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can find all contact details for Wellora in the footer section below.

faqs.question: What topics are covered on Wellora?
faqs.answer: Wellora covers a wide range of topics, including academics, personal growth, mental health, wealth-building strategies, lifestyle tips, fitness, and relationship advice.

faqs.question: Is all the content free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all content on Wellora is available for free personal use. Some external resources, such as books or courses, may redirect you to other platforms.

faqs.question: Are there any paid courses on Wellora?
faqs.answer: No, currently all courses and materials on Wellora are free. However, we may link to external paid courses if applicable.

faqs.question: How often is the content updated?
faqs.answer: Wellora content is updated regularly, with new tutorials, books, and resources being added on a weekly basis. Keep an eye on our social media channels for the latest updates.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for Wellora?
faqs.answer: At the moment, there is no dedicated mobile app for Wellora. However, the website is fully responsive and optimized for mobile use.

faqs.question: Can I contribute or suggest content?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Wellora welcomes contributions and suggestions. Use the contact methods above to send your ideas or content for consideration.

faqs.question: Do you offer certifications?
faqs.answer: Currently, Wellora does not offer certifications. However, we do link to certified courses on external platforms when relevant.
